title: Oklahoma City National Memorial: Ranger Programs
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Ranger Programs              Ranger Programs       National Park Service Rangers provide regularly scheduled Interpretive programs, discussing the site's significance, from Memorial Day through Labor Day. Please see our calendar page for dates and times  During both the summer and winter months, Park Rangers will be found dispensing information on the Memorial grounds every day from 8:30 am to 5:00 PM, except Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year's Day.  The Memorial grounds are open 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.   For more information, please call (405)609-8859.
